changelog:
•Improved overall app stability and reduced unexpected crashes
•Optimized app startup time for faster launch
Fixed UI glitches observed on certain screen sizes
Enhanced compatibility with the latest Android versions
Improved performance on low-RAM devices
Refined animations for smoother transitions
Fixed minor layout alignment issues across multiple screens
Improved background task handling to reduce battery usage
Updated internal libraries for better reliability
Resolved issues related to notification delivery
Improved error handling to prevent app freezes
Enhanced data handling to reduce memory consumption
Fixed rare bugs reported by users in the previous version
Improved responsiveness of touch interactions
Minor visual refinements for a cleaner user experience
Improved app behavior during orientation changes
General maintenance updates and internal optimizations
